name: Instant Pot Spicy Louisiana-Style Vegan Red Beans & Rice
instructions: Set Instant Pot to Sauté mode. Add oil, onion, bell pepper, and celery. Cook 5–7 minutes until soft.
Add garlic, paprika, thyme, oregano, cayenne, and black pepper. Stir for 1 minute until fragrant.
Cancel Sauté mode. Add rinsed beans, bay leaf, and vegetable broth. Do not add salt yet.
Lock lid and set valve to Sealing. Cook on Manual (High Pressure) for 35 minutes for unsoaked beans or 15 minutes for soaked beans.
Allow Natural Pressure Release for at least 20 minutes, then release any remaining pressure.
Remove bay leaf. Mash about ⅓ of the beans against the pot to thicken.
Turn on Sauté again and simmer uncovered 5–10 minutes if needed.
Stir in salt and liquid smoke.
Serve over rice with green onions and hot sauce.
